Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Capital City in 1984...
Injured on 7/2/1987 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/27/1990, off James Staggers (NJ)...
Earned first career win on 6/24/1990...
Traded from Capital City to Bay City on 7/21/1991 (Going to CC: P T. Prahl, P A. Hernandez. Going to BC: P R. Still)...
Injured on 8/27/1991 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
